name: For Class IX-X
text: Tuition and guidance through all required physics knowledge for class IX-X. I will provide 1 hour , 3 days in a week. Time can be discussed after meeting.

name: For Class XI-XII
text: Tuition and guidance through all required physics knowledge for class XI-XII. I will provide 1 hour , 3 days in a week. Time can be discussed after meeting.

name: Special Care For SSC Candidate
text: Tuition and guidance through all required physics knowledge for SSC Candidate. You will get my hand written notes and very short suggestions for final exam. Before 3 months of final exam I will take short time exam every study day. I will provide 1 hour , 3 days in a week. Time can be discussed after meeting.

name: Special Care For HSC Candidate
text: Tuition and guidance through all required physics knowledge for HSC Candidate. You will get my hand written notes and very short suggestions for final exam. Before 3 months of final exam I will take short time exam every study day. I will provide 1 hour , 3 days in a week. Time can be discussed after meeting.

name: SSC Batch
text: Tuition and guidance through all required physics knowledge for SSC Batch. I will provide 1 hour , 3 days in a week. Time can be discussed after meeting. There will be 10 students in every batch.
